<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Black Hole Armor](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1842)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 14 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 8,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 5
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Fortress Plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=21)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The joints of this black _+2 [greater resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [fortification](/Equipment.aspx?ID=285) [fortress plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=21)_ look like swirling vortices of silver. Non-magical ammunition and thrown weapons aimed at you are destroyed after they hit you and deal damage or miss you. You also have resistance 10 to physical damage from ranged attacks.

 When an enemy's ranged attack misses you or hits you and deals no damage, the armor absorbs the projectile. When it has absorbed six projectiles, the armor glows at the joints.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Frequency** once per minute; **Trigger** A ranged weapon Strike targets a creature within 20 feet of you and the attacker hasn't yet rolled its attack;  **Effect** The triggering Strike targets you instead of its intended target.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645))   **Requirements** The _black hole armor_ has absorbed six or more projectiles; **Effect** All the projectiles absorbed by the armor appear out of thin air, as though transported there, falling in a 10-foot burst within 120 feet of you. Each creature in the burst takes 10d8 piercing damage with a DC 35 Reflex save. The absorbed projectiles are all expended, and the armor's joints stop glowing.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Black Hole Armor
